tooltip.surrealbiomes.biome_chance: Sets the chance for this biome to generate in the world (0 to disable, 1 to make it as common as normal biomes)
tooltip.surrealbiomes.crystal.crystal_gr: Whether the crystal grass updates with randomticks.
tooltip.surrealbiomes.crystal.takeover: Whether the crystal grass can grow shardlings to aid in it's expansion (enabling can cause an infinite spread)
tooltip.surrealbiomes.crystal.crystal_gr: What block crystal grass spreads to
tooltip.surrealbiomes.crystal_features.c: The minimum radius of the crystal structures.
The maximum radius of the crystal structures.
The minimum height of the crystal structures.
The maximum height of the crystal structures.
How spread apart each individual crystal generates from the origin
tooltip.surrealbiomes.rainbow.frequency: The multiplier how dense the rainbow effect generates
tooltip.surrealbiomes.rainbow_features.r: The minimum radius of the rainbow spike structures
The maximum radius of the rainbow spike structures
The maximum height of the rainbow spike structures
How dramatically the height of the rainbow spikes decrease as their distance from the origin increases
desc.surrealbiomes.crystal_features.comp: To change which blocks generate in the crystal structure, change the values in the 'composition_list' and 'root_blocks' fields using the config file at config/surrealbiomes.json
desc.surrealbiomes.rainbow.color_blocks: To change which blocks generate at the surface of rainbow deserts, change the values in the 'color_blocks' field using the config file at config/surrealbiomes.json
desc.surrealbiomes.rainbow_features.spik: To change which blocks generate in the spike structure, change the values in the 'spike_blocks' field using the config file at config/surrealbiomes.json
